name: Pilates Ball
descr:
The little exercise ball with the big power.

You can take this little effective ball anywhere. It is easy to inflate by mouth (which included little "straws") and it is easy to empty the ball of air again. The ball is super easy to transport, store and use. The Pilates ball is brilliant fo all kinds of training. The popularity and use of the ball is impressive, partly due to price and is easy, simple and incredibly easy to use while is has an optimal effect on the body.

Size: approx. 19 cm. and 25 cm. in diameter.

The Pilates ball withstand a dynamic load of 130 kg. Generally used in Pilates and is extremely effective to the stomach, bottom and thighs, as well as training of topside and back.
